divs: Sighting Details1- on my roof taking a break from work 2- a reflective glint 3- it seems to tumble in slow motion 4- was reflecting and blinking 5-just amazed 6- blinked and they were gone
Summary: I saw a falling and then hovering object track slowly across the sky and then noticed a second one slightly above and further away from the first one. The were both reflecting light and blink in this random pattern. I then heard two Military attack choppe
